title: JST, Psalms 24
content: Lift up your heads, O ye
the Lord strong and mighty; the Lord mighty in battle, who is the king of glory,
And he will roll away the heavens; and will come down to redeem his people; to make you an everlasting name; to establish you upon his everlasting rock.
Lift up your heads, O ye
Lord of hosts, the king of kings;
the king of glory shall come
unto you; and shall redeem his people, and shall establish them in righteousness.
